sentences.sContent: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.

sentences.sCn: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.sContent: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.sCn: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.sContent: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.sCn: 增进健康减少疾病的方法
